# Packages
```{r, warning = FALSE}
library("tidyverse")
```

# Loading files
```{r}
cover <- readr::read_tsv("../Data/INCLINE_community_species_cover.txt", guess_max = Inf, trim_ws = TRUE)
traits <- read_tsv("../Data/PFTC6_clean_leaf_traits_2022.txt", guess_max = Inf, trim_ws = TRUE)
```

# Selecting Incline data and removing problematic entries
```{r}
traits <- traits %>% filter(project == "Incline") %>% select(-c(gradient, blockID, turfID, warming, grazing,
                                                                Nlevel, Namount_kg_ha_y, ...36, ...37))
# observations can be removed based on: comment, flag, remark, remark_dry_mass and scanning_comment
# two files: one with NA values for certain traits in a sample and one without NAs
# comments and remarks can be completely omitted
```
